name: Ext_R4_PlanDefinition_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.PlanDefinition.subject[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.subject[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Type of individual the plan definition is focused on
element.definition: A code or group definition that describes the intended subject of the plan definition.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.subject[x]` maps to R5 `PlanDefinition.subject[x]`. Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdministrableProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ManufacturedItemDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PackagedProductDefinition)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Type of individual the plan definition is focused on
element.definition: A code or group definition that describes the intended subject of the plan definition.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.subject[x]` maps to R5 `PlanDefinition.subject[x]`. Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdministrableProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ManufacturedItemDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PackagedProductDefinition)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The possible types of subjects for a plan definition (E.g. Patient, Practitioner, Organization, Location, etc.).
